products.name: Easygenerator
products.description: Easygenerator is a cloud-based e-learning platform that allows users to create and deliver engaging online courses.

personas.description: Focuses on course creation efficiencies, feature depth, and learner engagement tools.
Focuses on high-level business value, ROI, and scalability of the solution.
Focuses on team management, oversight capabilities, and strategic alignment.
Focuses on ease of creating quizzes, tests, and training materials for colleagues and trainees.
Focuses on learning and development strategy, team training oversight, and content quality.
Focuses on onboarding, employee training scalability, and multi-department training needs.
Focuses on rapid course development, content blocks, and collaborative features.
Focuses on product-specific training, interactive e-learning, and organized course management.
Focuses on technical training delivery, video-based content, and software instruction.
Focuses on specialized training programs, assessment tools, and learner tracking.
Focuses on compliance training, audit trails, reporting, and regulatory requirements.
Focuses on employee onboarding, HR training modules, and organizational learning needs.
Focuses on holistic training delivery, SME collaboration, and content quality oversight.
